name: Grounders
description:
Grounders | Hat Jam

Players control two business men being hunted down by a giant vulture after becoming lost in the desert. Only one player can survive being made bird food, so players can sabotage each others efforts to avoid its clutches.

Controls

P1 Controls: WASD

P2 Controls: Arrows

Created by Andreia Gonçalves and Errol Hanham in 2016 for the Hat Jam 11 "Playground Games" with the theme "Grounders". All assets created by us.
